programme.desc: One Piece

Shin confronts his brother deep within Legion territory.
The crew of Spearhead has left on their final mission, never to return home; but something awaits them outside the borders of their home.
Spearhead Squadron comes to the end of their long road, and a new journey begins for Lena.

Several weeks after Shin and his friends went missing, Lena is demoted from commanding Spearhead and is in charge of conventional 86 unit; Shin wakes up from his dying dream to find him and his friends in the custody of the Federacy of Giad.

Despite making friends and enjoying the luxuries the Federacy can provide, Shin and his friends can't shake the feeling that they don't belong there; on the Eve of the Holy Birth, they conclude that they will return to the battlefield.
The crew of Spearhead find themselves back on the battlefield, as the tide of the war turns against the Federacy.

With Federacy analysts predicting a massive Legion offensive, the Federacy military decides to reorganize its forces in order to prepare for the attack; in the Republic, Lena continues preparing for the Legion attack, who are closing on the borders.
The Legion's large-scale offensive begins, and the Spearhead crew are sent into the thick of the fighting, but even back at base, there's no safety to be found.

programme.desc: A writer (Stephen Dillane) has trouble moving past his haunting memories of the Holocaust. Starring Stephen Dillane, Rade Serbedzija, Rosamund Pike.

programme.desc: February 2nd keeps repeating for a cynical TV weatherman (Bill Murray) sent to watch the groundhog in Punxsutawney, Pa. Starring Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott.
